timeline.message:
Fix vanish logins and pool persistence between restarts
* Also add /reloadpools

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: I would rather add this functionality to /pgm, and no need for any command output. It's just like reloading any other part of the config.
timeline.author: Electroid

replies.bodyText: Alrighty! I mainly split it up to provide the output, but if it’s not necessary I’ll add this to /pgm 👍
replies.author: applenick
